Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located in the Detroit’s historic Eastern Market District, the Property recently underwent a complete renovation. With all new mechanicals, elevator, and common areas the building has been transformed into a first-class office environment.

The Property boasts dedicated parking immediately across the street, Anthology Coffee on-site, while also providing easy access to area freeways, Eastern Market amenities, and the Dequindre Cut...all of which make the opportunity truly unique.

Private parking lot across the street included in sale

Common.Brochures.Common.BrochureName: Detroit - Ren Cen Brochure - DIGITAL ONLY - March 2020.pdf

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Along the 3 mile route, the Riverwalk offers spectacular views of the city skyline and provides walkable access to Harbortown, Mt. Elliot Park and Milliken State Park along the Detroit River. The RiverWalk is home to many events including the free Chevrolet Rockin’ on the Riverfront concert series, Riverfront Run, Eastern Market
farm stand, Reading & Rhythm on the Riverfront and more.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The GMRENCEN is the most recognized landmark in the region. Rising 73 stories above the Detroit River, the GMRENCEN anchors the Detroit skyline and riverfront.
Composed of eight interconnected buildings (towers 100-600, the Detroit Marriott at the Renaissance Center hotel and Millender Center), this class ‘A’ mixed-use complex measures in excess of 5.5 million square feet of combined office, dining, retail and lodging space. The GMRENCEN hosts more than 150 events annually, and has easy access to Detroit sport venues, TCF Center, casinos and more.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The Tower at 211, located in downtown Detroit, is just a short walk to the city’s focal point at Campus Martius. The walkability of the location affords Tenant’s easy access to a broad array of dining, retail, and entertainment establishments throughout the Central Business District (CBD).

Located at the corner of Fort St. and Washington Blvd., the Tower at 211 provides unparalleled accessibility for employees with immediate access to ‘The Lodge’ (MI-
10), an arterial thoroughfare which feeds directly into Interstates 75, 94, 96 and serves as a gateway to the entire Metro area.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Comprised of 438,640 rentable square feet across 26 floors, the Tower at 211 is one of the few buildings in the market to offer floor-to-ceiling windows, providing
ample natural light and unobstructed views, all within a Class A environment. Additionally, the rectangular 18,000 RSF floor plates are extremely flexible and
efficiently plan for both full-floor and multi-tenant layouts.
